---
category: news
title: "Mike’s Maze reveals artificial intelligence theme cornfield in Sunderland"
excerpt: "SUNDERLAND, Mass. (WWLP) – Aerial footage reveals this year’s theme of Mike’s Maze cornfield in Sunderland. Every fall, Warner Farm in Sunderland transforms its cornfield into a maze. The maze’s design this year depicts artificial intelligence circuits, a motherboard pattern with the word ‘Thinking’ surrounded by letters and symbols."
